meanings.definition: A religion practiced chiefly in Haiti, based on African religious beliefs and Catholicism.
meanings.sent1: Many people in Haiti follow the voudouns religion.
meanings.sent2: Voudouns combines African beliefs with Catholicism.
meanings.sent3: The voudouns ceremony was both spiritual and colorful.
meanings.sent4: The essence of voudouns permeated the air during the ritual.
meanings.sent5: The voudouns practices were deeply rooted in tradition.

meanings.sent2: She learned from an experienced voudouns in the community.
meanings.sent3: The voudouns accidentally mixed up their potions, causing a funny mishap.
meanings.sent4: He was a voudouns in the art of healing hearts.
meanings.sent5: The voudouns' presence brought a sense of peace to the village.
